item.title: Data Integration
item.description:
• Proteomics with Transciptomics and Metabolomics
  • pplication of GO for Proteomics

At the Pro-Met-Facility, we offer several data services. Starting with assistance in experimental design, followed by drug- molecule- metabolite- peptide- protein- identification, statistical tests for significance, data visualization, data archival and manuscript support.

item.title: Data Visualization
item.description:
• Frequency Distributions
  • Box, Whisker, Violin Plots
  • Scatter distributions
  • Dimensionality Reduction Plots
  • Volcano, MA Plots

At the Pro-Met-Facility, we offer several data services. Starting with assistance in experimental design, followed by drug- molecule- metabolite- peptide- protein- identification, statistical tests for significance, data visualization, data archival and manuscript support.
